title.narrative: Networking activity to RHNK conference on AYSRHR in Kenya

description.narrative: The 4th Adolescent Sexual and Reproductive Health and Rights Scientific Conference is organized by the Reproductive Health Network Kenya (RHNK) It will be held in Kilifi county, Kenya, which provides a valuable opportunity for project RESPEKT to learn more about youth engagements and help increase knowledge and acceptability of SRHR services in the communities, address the challenges and also meet relevant stakeholders to develop our advocacy programmes RHNK holds the Adolescent Sexual and Reproductive Health and Rights Scientific Conference on an annual basis to provide a platform for different actors such as SRHR stakeholders, policy makers, service providers and the young demographic to share experiences and learn new information on sexual and reproductive health and rights from experts
